markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hero's Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=2643) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sprite" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=238" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 131 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Energize Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=2639)

</column>

---

You have begun the final steps to reaching your full potential. Your wings are always in their majestic form without you needing to use Energize Wings, granting you a permanent fly Speed. Furthermore, sprites recognize you as a powerful hero (or villain) by your unique wings and are appropriately impressed. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on all [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) and [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) checks against sprites and gain the benefits of the [Glad-Hand](/Feats.aspx?ID=787) skill feat against other sprites, without taking a –5 penalty to your Diplomacy check.
name: Hero's Wings

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 17" pfs="Standard" > Hero's Wings Source Ancestry Guide pg. 131 2.0 Prerequisites Energize Wings --- You have begun the final steps to reaching your full potential. Your wings are always in their majestic form without you needing to use Energize Wings, granting you a permanent fly Speed. Furthermore, sprites recognize you as a powerful hero (or villain) by your unique wings and are appropriately impressed. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on all Diplomacy and Intimidation checks against sprites and gain the benefits of the Glad-Hand skill feat against other sprites, without taking a –5 penalty to your Diplomacy check.
